description: Detects file creation patterns noticeable during the exploitation of CVE-2021-40444 Author: Florian Roth, Sittikorn S. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Word Cab File Write CVE-2021-40444
query: (process.executable:"\\winword.exe" AND ((file.path:*.cab AND file.path:*\\Windows\\INetCache*) OR (file.path:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* AND file.path:*.inf*)))
